definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: He is believed to have been executed with an antiaircraft gun.
sentences.chinese: 據信玄永哲是被用高射炮處決。

sentences.english: A bomber had been brought down by the anti-aircraft fire.
sentences.chinese: 一架轟炸機被高射炮火擊中了。

sentences.english: Our militia fired off volley after volley from anti-aircraft artillery.
sentences.chinese: 我民兵的高射炮連續進行射擊。

sentences.english: When you were in the Guards mortars , did you have anti-aircraft cover?
sentences.chinese: 當你在近衛迫擊炮部隊時，有高射炮掩護嗎？

sentences.english: The bullets from our antiaircraft gun ripped into the fuselage of the enemy bomber.
sentences.chinese: 我們高射炮的子彈射入敵人轟炸機的機身。

sentences.english: Early 1950, after approval of the Central Military Commission, the first Navy flight school in Qingdao to build completion.
sentences.chinese: 不久，海軍第一支高射炮兵部隊也在青島成立。
高射炮火像雹子般轟擊飛機。

sentences.english: The road was guarded by anti-aircraft guns.
sentences.chinese: 這條公路有高射炮防衛。
高射炮擊落了三架轟炸機。

sentences.english: Because I've called them to prepare the archibalds.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我已經叫他們準備了高射炮了。

sentences.english: A related medium anti-aircraft gun was Red Queen.
sentences.chinese: 一種相似的中型高射炮是紅色皇后。

sentences.english: Libyan anti-aircraft guns have been opening up into the night sky, firing streams of tracer around.
sentences.chinese: 利比亞高射炮也向夜空開火，發射了大量炮彈。

sentences.english: The anti-aircraft guns shot down three enemy planes.
sentences.chinese: 高射炮擊落了三架敵機。

sentences.english: Surely you didn't think you could evade the Reich for long, Lieutenant?
sentences.chinese: 我想你應該想說可以躲避的了高射炮火力吧，少尉？

definition: big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
